summary.body: Hi, I need to have new locks installed on our front door lock and windows. Any suggestions for a reliable locksmith / contractor? Thanks
summary.subject: Locks

summary.body: ... a man (or two) with a van? And a good locksmith for the Barbican? Thanks!

summary.body: Hi, Does anyone have a recommendation for a locksmith that is experienced with the Barbican? Any suggestions much appreciated. Thanks
summary.subject: Locksmith recommendation
